Package com.tinkerpop.rexster.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RexsterApplication
    RexsterApplication is the interface that Rexster's servlets all delegate to in order to actually retrieve or query graphs.
    RexsterProperties.RexsterPropertiesListener  
    RexsterServer
    Interface for the various "servers" that Rexster exposes.
    ShutdownManager.ShutdownListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMapRexsterApplication
    Base class for implementations that need to use a Map to hold graphs served by Rexster.
    DefaultRexsterApplication
    Configure a single existing graph into Rexster.
    GrizzlyIoStrategyFactory
    Creates various IOStrategy implementations for Grizzly.
    HttpRexsterServer
    Initializes the HTTP server for Rexster serving REST and Dog House.
    RexProRexsterServer
    Initializes the TCP server that serves RexPro.
    RexsterApplicationProvider
    A Jersey InjectableProvider and Injectable that supplies Servlets that have a @Context annotated RexsterApplication field with a DefaultRexsterApplication.
    RexsterCommandLine
    Holds command line options and parameters.
    RexsterProperties
    RexsterProperties are settings that come from the rexster.xml configuration file appended with other in server settings that come from the command line.
    RexsterSettings
    RexsterSettings is the combination of the Rexster configuration options and command line overrides.
    ShutdownManager
    Manages the socket listening for incoming shutdown requests.
    XmlRexsterApplication
    Configure multiple graphs in rexster via XML based Apache Configuration.
